name: Land Of The Void
description: Land Of The Void is Roguelike STG game, combined with dungeon exploration. You need to think about the battle strategy of STG & rune integration, in the meanwhile recruiting teammates, exploring the dungeon to obtain equipment and items, completing tasks and accumulating resources.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10 Processor: 2.0GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.5GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
